bug.author: mark4z
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/31958>#31958</denchmark-link> URL(s) with the issue: <denchmark-link:https://developers.google.cn/machine-learning/crash-course/reducing-loss/video-lecture>https://developers.google.cn/machine-learning/crash-course/reducing-loss/video-lecture</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
On 1:50,it prompts me to do the gradient-descent practice，when i click the button,then redirect to the wrong page. <denchmark-h:h3>Correct links</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://developers.google.cn/machine-learning/crash-course/reducing-loss/gradient-descent>https://developers.google.cn/machine-learning/crash-course/reducing-loss/gradient-descent</denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
I believe you are referring to this; <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42785357/63890025-f5f0ff00-c996-11e9-9b83-ffbd7cb5e49b.png></denchmark-link>
The link points to <denchmark-link:https://developers.google.cn/machine-learning/crash-course/fitter/graph>https://developers.google.cn/machine-learning/crash-course/fitter/graph</denchmark-link> which I think is correct because you are given exercises and solutions to practice.

Are you satisfied with the resolution of your issue? <denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=Yes&entry.2137816233=31965>Yes</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=No&entry.2137816233=31965>No</denchmark-link>

May be u are right.But it's weird for a native Chinese speaker <denchmark-link:#>…</denchmark-link>
